# upperBodyOnly

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the request requires detecting a full body or upper body only to produce a result.

## Declaration

```swift
var upperBodyOnly: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] indicates that the request requires detecting a person’s upper body only to find the bound box around it.
title: upperBodyOnly
